flawed_nl_solution:
His new deadlift is 300*2.5+100=<<300*2.5+100=850>>850 pounds
So he added 850-300=<<850-300=505>>505 pounds to his deadlift
This took 18-13=<<18-13=5>>5 years
So he added 505/5=<<505/5=101>>101 pounds per year
#### 101

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 550, not 505. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
